#summary How to setup a development environment for PINF

= Requirements =

  * UNIX
  * SVN Client
  * PHP 5.2+
  * PEAR
  ** Phing
     {{{
        pear channel-discover pear.phing.info
        pear install phing/phing
     }}}
  ** VersionControl_SVN
     {{{
        pear install channel://pear.php.net/VersionControl_SVN-0.3.1
     }}}

= Checkout =

PINF Core: http://pinf.googlecode.com/svn/branches/core-0.1/

See http://code.google.com/p/pinf/source/checkout for specifics.


= Setup =

<font color="red">*NOTE:* If the setup does not run successfully, please post any error messages/patches and feedback below.</font>

{{{
phing dev-setup
}}}

_dev-setup_ will checkout a copy of [Phing], [ZendFramework] and [PHPUnit] into _./build/pear_ and build and publish development bootstrap files for PINF into _./build/pear/pinf_ and install _./build/pear/pinf/package.xml_ using your default PEAR installer.

= Test =

If the following command works the core of PINF is installed successfully (in development mode).

{{{
pinf show version
}}}
